channel.title: Ring Jewelry on Jaka Pribošek

item.title: Engagement and wedding rings
item.description: I casted the engagement ring from sterling silver and wedding rings from 18 carat white gold (gold-nickel). From mastering lost-wax process to casting fine details, I decided to develop the technology from scratch, which happened to be quite a stressful journey. First, everythign started by designing the ring in the Fusion360.
